Detailed Description

template<class T, object_holder_type OPT>
class matador::object_pointer< T, OPT >

The object_pointer holds a pointer to an serializable.

Template Parameters
TThe type of the serializable.

The object_pointer holds a pointer to an object. The object_pointer is a wrapper class for the object class It has a reference count mechanism. The objects inserted into the object_store are returned as a object_pointer and should be used through the object_pointer class.
